description:
The truth is revealed and it is up to Tagiru and Arresterdramon to save the digital world and the real world.  But will the power of Brave Snatcher be enough to stop Quartzmon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Fired Up, Tagiru! The Digimon Hunt for All the Glory!
Moeagare Tagiru! Eikou no Digimon Hunt!
燃え上がれタギル! 栄光のデジモンハント!
